name: Horror Hunting - Monster Swamp
description:
SHOOT ZOMBIES AND HUNTERS
Be a bounty hunter of this Western Shooting game, break through the inhospitable terrain of 19th century full of cruel enemies: zombies, their bosses and other hunters.

FROM ONE CHECKPOINT TO ANOTHER
- Investigate wide territory and search for clues;
- Defeat different rivals and bosses in battles;
- Shoot to stay alive, find a way to get out this cursed place!

Explore all the territory to get rid of evil's expansion and annihilate your rivals!

MYSTERIOUS LAND WITH CRUEL ZOMBIES
- Old houses and farms with barns;
- Stone ruins of the abandoned cemetery;
- Dilapidated chapels and old mansions!

Shoot zombies to collect points. Unlock new kinds of bigger and better weapons. Improve your shooting skills, endurance or health.

GET AN UNFORGETTABLE GAMING EXPERIENCE
- Combination of a western shooter with a horror game
- Bright graphics and realistic special effects
- Awesome level design with cool accompaniment

Plunge into the atmosphere of the Wild West with our action-packed shooter game!
